paper_abstract: Thue proved that the factors occurring infinitely many times in square-free words over {0, 1,2} avoiding the factors in {010,212} are the factors of the fixed point of the morphism 0 bar right arrow 012, 1 bar right arrow 02, 2 bar right arrow 1. He similarly characterized square-free words avoiding {010, 020} and (121, 212} as the factors of two morphic words. In this paper, we exhibit smaller morphisms to define these two square-free morphic words and we give such characterizations for six types of binary words containing few distinct squares. paper_title: Characterization of some binary words with few squares
